label: SpecifiedTemperature
comment: A specified temperature value or range of values.

objectProperties.comment: The measure of the highest value of a range for this specified temperature, such as a maximum temperature value of fourteen degrees Celsius.
The measure of the lowest value of a range for this specified temperature, such as a minimum temperature value of four degrees Celsius.
The measure of the value of this specified temperature, such as a temperature value of ten degrees Celsius.

referencedBy.comment: The specified temperature applicable for this applied chemical treatment.
